change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 318/2003, effective September 1, 2003.

section.sectiontext: The British Columbia Fire Code which adopts with some changes the National Fire Code of Canada 1995 as it existed on January 1, 1998, is adopted and enacted in the form attached to this regulation.

lefttext.em: Exempt from publication. This code may be purchased from Government Publications, Queen's Printer, 1-800-663-6105 or (250) 387-6409, 2nd Floor, 563 Superior Street, Victoria, B.C. V8W 9V7. Changes to the National Code are published in the British Columbia Gazette, Part II, Volume 41, No. 16, page 569.

content.regnote: Note: this regulation replaces B.C. Regs. 492/59, 173/60, 175/62, 63/78, 15/87 and 403/92.
content.provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Fire Services Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 144, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 47 (2)]
